title: Sync Creatives Async Response - Input Required
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for sync_creatives when status is 'input-required'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that human approval or input is needed before the creative sync can proceed (e.g., brand safety review, content approval).

creative_ids.description: Array of creative IDs requiring approval or input. Required for identifying which creatives need attention.

errors.description: Array of error objects explaining what approval or input is needed

context.description: Application-level context echoed from the request. Opaque correlation data for internal tracking.

examples.description: Input required for brand safety review

errors.message: Creatives contain content that requires manual brand safety review before approval. Please review and approve or provide alternative assets.
errors.suggestion: Review creative content against publisher's brand safety guidelines or provide alternative assets
